Application version update
desc:
Currently the application is built using angular 5 and ionic 3. This framework version is 3 years old and we haven't gone live yet.

Two known issues that this is affecting are:
    - @ionic-native/file - connect be upgraded
    - Date picker requires a newer version of angular 

Attempting to port the application to the latest version of ionic and angular.
